home.title: Welcome to your legal operating system

features.subtitle: Everything your team needs to manage cases with speed, automation and AI

hero.title: Transform your medical documentation into clear and automated legal arguments
hero.subtitle: The artificial intelligence platform created for law firms that litigate personal injury cases.
hero.description: Organize, interpret and draft for you ‚Äî in minutes, not hours.

problems.title: Does this sound familiar? This is what slows down your legal team every week.
problems.subtitle: Millions in compensation are delayed (or lost) due to avoidable errors that this platform eliminates.

card1.title: üìÅ Disorganized documents ‚Üí Cause of legal errors
card1.description: PDFs, prescriptions and notes arrive by email, WhatsApp or scans. Losing a single document can dismantle your strategy.

card2.title: ‚è∞ Hours searching for data ‚Üí Lost billable time
card2.description: What was prescribed? When was the patient seen? Which exam was done first? Every search costs money and delays cases.

card3.title: ‚ö†Ô∏è Manual errors ‚Üí Weakened legal arguments
card3.description: Misinterpreted dates, omitted medications, or incorrect medical sequences can destroy a solid case.

card4.title: üìâ Inefficient processes ‚Üí Lost cases and revenue
card4.description: While you organize documents manually, competitors with AI are closing cases faster and with better results.

steps.title: Real legal automation from the first click

step1.title: Upload everything without worrying about format
step1.description: Disorganized PDFs, prescription photos or medical reports:
step1.detail: The platform classifies and reads them for you. No manual sorting, no lost files. Everything is automatically organized and ready to analyze.

step2.title: Ask the AI what you need
step2.description: Questions in natural language, with precise answers:
step2.detail: "What did the doctor prescribe on the day of the accident?" "How many studies were done in the first week?" Get instant answers linked to the original document.

step3.title: Download medical or legal letters ready to send
step3.description: Editable, complete and with all information already analyzed:
step3.detail: Hospital requests, medical reports, or legal initiation letters. Everything ready to sign, send, or incorporate into the lawsuit.

scenarios.title: What your legal team can achieve in minutes (used to take hours)
scenarios.subtitle: The platform's AI replaces hours of review, drafting and searching with instant precision.

item1.title: üìå Generate a medical letter in 2 minutes
item1.description: Before: 30 minutes of manual review and drafting. Now: you select the type, and AI assembles it with your data.

item2.title: üéØ Complete medical chronology in 5 minutes
item2.description: Before: Hours reviewing documents to create timeline. Now: AI automatically organizes dates, treatments, and medical evolution.

item3.title: ‚úÖ Hospital information request in 1 minute
item3.description: Before: Drafting formal letters from scratch. Now: AI generates the complete request with all legal requirements.

item4.title: ‚ö° Legal process initiation in 10 minutes
item4.description: Before: Days organizing evidence and arguments. Now: AI structures everything with medical data ready to sue.

cta.title: Ready to transform your legal practice?
cta.description: Join hundreds of law firms already using AI to win more cases in less time.

plans.title: Plans designed for law firms of all sizes

cta.title: Make your law firm work like a legal team augmented by AI
cta.subtitle: Reduce time, gain precision and focus on what matters: solving cases.

Admin.dashboardDesc: View overall statistics and performance metrics
Admin.productsDesc: Add, edit, and manage product inventory

intro.title: A platform that works as part of your legal team
intro.subtitle: Explore each of the functions designed to digitize, automate, and scale how your firm manages personal injury cases.

caseManagement.title: Case management with unified legal and medical structure
caseManagement.description: Centralize files, documents, involved parties, and tasks in a single system. Each case is structured to facilitate legal analysis and decision-making.
benefits: Overview of each case (with timeline, parties, and documents)
Automatic association between files and patients
System of medical and legal tags to filter relevant information
Complete history of interactions and edits by user

timeline.title: Automatic medical chronology ready for trial
timeline.description: Every uploaded document is analyzed and placed on a structured timeline. The platform detects key dates, diagnoses, medications, and procedures.
benefits: Automatic order of clinical and legal events
Editable visualization for hearings or expert opinions
Grouping by date, type of care, medical specialty
Ideal for explaining the evolution of damage to judges or insurers

legalChat.title: Consult your own files as if talking to an expert
legalChat.description: An AI system specifically trained to interpret your documents. You don't need to remember where the information is, just ask.
capabilities: Accurately answers legal or medical questions
Cites the source document with each answer
Allows tracking treatments, key dates, medications, injuries
Available in natural language, without complex commands

letterGenerator.title: Automatic, complete letters ready for signature
letterGenerator.description: From information requests to medico-legal reports, generate formal letters with a click. Customizable, downloadable, and with already processed data.
types: Demand letters, claim initiation, or responses
Custom templates according to your style

viewer.title: Advanced document viewer with real-time analysis
viewer.description: Upload any file (PDF, image, scan) and navigate it without leaving the platform. With semantic search, key term highlighting, and cross-linking with other modules.
functions: Search by symptoms, medications, or legal terms
Highlighting of dates, names, diagnoses, ICD-10

multiUser.title: Secure collaboration between lawyers, assistants, and doctors
multiUser.description: Assign access by role, limit permissions, and supervise team activity. The platform allows simultaneous work without losing traceability.
includes: Notifications for relevant activity in assigned cases

finalCTA.title: A system designed for modern legal teams
finalCTA.text: All functions are integrated, designed to save time and prevent errors. More than software, it's your new paralegal with superpowers.
